meanings.definition: A small mechanical device or control
meanings.sent1: The engineer fixed the widgets on the machine to make it work smoothly.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy some widgets to repair my bicycle.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the widgets, causing the machine to malfunction.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a complex system of widgets, each one controlling a different aspect of her personality.
meanings.sent5: The widgets clicked into place like a puzzle, revealing the inner workings of the device.
